metadata.title: CVE-2023-39534 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
eprosima Fast DDS is a C++ implementation of the Data Distribution Servicestandard of the Object Management Group. Prior to versions 2.10.0, 2.9.2,and 2.6.5, a malformed GAP submessage can trigger assertion failure,crashing FastDDS. Version 2.10.0, 2.9.2, and 2.6.5 contain a patch for thisissue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39534` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fastdds-tools - 2.10.1+ds-3
libfastrtps2.10 - 2.10.1+ds-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fastdds package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.1+ds-3').
